name: Bagehot Limited
membership: Our Managing Director Sir Graham Watson is a Member of the European Economic and Social Committee (since Oct 2015)
goal: To provide its clients with information, intelligence and advice about matters of EU policy and to assist them in pursuit of their interests at EU level
interests: Climate Action, Competition, Digital economy and society, Economy, finance and the euro, Energy, Environment, Foreign affairs and security policy, Justice and Fundamental Rights, Maritime affairs and fisheries, Regional Policy, Single market, Transport, Youth
euInitiatives: Brexit preparation, energy policy, transport policy, regional policy, environment, financial services, single market
